title: Hitlists browseable + searchable (2012-04 - 2013-10)
description:
Contains:

   A listing of the contents of the ComicPirates "Hitlist" Weeklies, excluding the 
   "Adult" and "Non-English" packs, from the beginning thru the latest instalment.

   Details:   First = 2012-04-11   |   Last = 2013-10-30   |   Count = 36,834

   Mirrors:   Online Option  ......... <a href=" http://sites.google.com/site/apostrophe2zorro" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://sites.google.com/site/apostrophe2zorro</a>
              Direct Download  .......  (linked from the link immediately above)
              Filelocker Fallback  ... 

---

The principal function of this listing, the way I use it, is merely to find release names. If I were looking for "The Art of Hellboy", say, I'd scroll down to that point in the alphabet (line ~29,600), and voila, there are three versions:

   The Art of Hellboy (2003) (digital) (Minutemen-InnerDemons).cbr (45.65 MB)
   The Art of Hellboy (2003) (digital) (Son of Ultron-Empire).cbr (128.78 MB)
   The Art of Hellboy(2003)(Digital)(Tyrant Lizard King-EMPIRE).cbr (115.61 MB)

Finding download locations for any or all of those versions is another matter, but that's what search engines are for, and feeding those with release names rather than just titles makes them vastly more efficacious. :)
